Package fr.lipn.uima.util.externprog

Interface Summary
ExternalProgram.ReaderConsumer The threads controlling stdout and stderr streams call ExternalProgram.ReaderConsumer.consumeReader(Reader) after initalizing the text decoder (the Reader object) connected to the stream.
ExternalProgram.WriterFeeder The thread controlling stdin steam calls ExternalProgram.WriterFeeder.feedWriter(Writer) after initializing the text encoder (the Writer object) connected to this stream.
 

Class Summary
ExternalProgram Used to launch an external application in a rather safe, efficient and convenient way: streams are processed in different threads (which use buffering through the Channels methods - unless I'm wrong !)
FromReaderWriterFeeder This ExternalProgram.WriterFeeder object reads the content of a generic Reader object and writes it to the stdin stream.
StringReaderConsumer This ExternalProgram.ReaderConsumer object stores an output stream in a String.
StringWriterFeeder This ExternalProgram.WriterFeeder object takes stdin as a String and writes it to the stream.
ToWriterReaderConsumer This ExternalProgram.ReaderConsumer object writes an output stream to a generic Writer object.
 

Exception Summary
ExternalProgramException  
TimeOutException A special case of ExternalProgramException.
